headline: Lam Research Rides AI Demand As Capacity Expansion Meets Valuation Questions
summary: Lam Research reported record quarterly and annual results, supported by strong demand for AI related semiconductor manufacturing equipment. The company is expanding manufacturing and R&D capacity as equipment supply shortages and cleanroom constraints start to bite. Management highlighted both market share gains and tight supply conditions across key product lines. For investors watching NasdaqGS:LRCX, the latest update underlines how closely Lam Research is tied to AI driven chip...
